short_desc: BART's Lost and Found receives reports of lost items online and in person, and handles claiming of items by owners
description: BART's Lost and Found is located in the 12th Street/Oakland City Center Station, corner of 14th Street and Broadway. Open Monday, Wednesday and Friday, 12noon-2pm and 3-6pm. Closed on holidays.Those inquiring into lost and found items can also use the online form at www.bart.gov. Go to Rider's Guide link and fill out Lost Item Report Form. If an item is found by BART, BART will send a postcard to the owner who inquired into it. To claim item, being valid photo identification with a mailing address to the Lost and Found window. No exceptions.For keys and glasses (which are found in abundance), go to Lost and Found window. Photo ID required to search.Items can take 1 week to 1 month to reach BART's Lost and Found.
